alert.note: Alert for Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:51PM CDT until May 09 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near McAllister affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. Menominee River near Florence affecting Dickinson, Florence and Iron Counties. Oconto River above Oconto affecting Oconto County. For the Menominee River...including Florence, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Oconto River...including Oconto...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconto River above Oconto. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Up to a foot of water surrounds structures in a campground in the city of Oconto. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.8 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon.
